wpt.name: GC1GX30
wpt.desc: Ready 4 My Closeup by 1FOG, Traditional Cache (1/1)

groundspeak:cache.groundspeak:name: Ready 4 My Closeup
groundspeak:cache.groundspeak:short_description: Cache and Grab, parking close by.
groundspeak:cache.groundspeak:long_description:
Small container hidden in plain sight. Stealth may be required. Container can be removed to take inside your car for opening, logging and sealing if additional stealth is needed. Please return to exact spot. No pen or pencil provided. Use common sense when crossing the lot...it is sometimes very busy with cars and people coming and going; then 10 minutes later it'll be deserted.
FTF gets a Geo Coin : Frowny Face
Hints will be posted when needed. I think novice and seasoned players should have no difficulty to find it.
Enjoy!
10/11/08 : Extra Credit for Gosffo...see images (Suitable for framing!)
